title: Bloomberg's Hutton on Skepticism For Brexit Pollsters (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Hutton on Skepticism For Brexit Pollsters (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Robert Hutton, UK government and politics reporter for Bloomberg News, on the latest Brexit polls, and why pollsters are feeling bewildered.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
